thread.title: Many Happy Returns After Tax Day - MoneyBeat - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: Many Happy Returns After Tax Day - MoneyBeat - WSJ

organizations.name: morgan stanley investors fret over capital returns

text: Millions of Americans got an unexpected reprieve on Tuesday when it came to their hard-earned money, but investors probably shouldn’t have been happy about it. For the first time ever, a computer glitch caused the Internal Revenue Service’s deadline for filing personal income taxes to be extended by a day.
